function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Communication of infectious diseases through human interaction and contact","Impact":"Spread of diseases leading to more human casualties, economic damage, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene protocols, social distancing measures, and vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, vaccination tracking systems, and AI for disease prediction","People":"General public, healthcare workers, travelers, and individuals in densely populated areas","Owner":"Health organizations, government authorities, and public health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of unambiguous definitions of infectious disease terms","Impact":"Misunderstanding and miscommunication leading to ineffective disease control and response","Mitigation":"Developing and using standardized ontologies and terminologies for infectious diseases","Technologies":"Ontology development tools, semantic web technologies, and natural language processing","People":"Healthcare professionals, epidemiologists, and researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations, and academic institutions"},{"Description":"Economic impact of pandemics on tourism and air travel sectors","Impact":"Loss of revenue, job cuts, and decline in economic growth","Mitigation":"Implementing strict travel restrictions, safety protocols, and financial support for affected industries","Technologies":"Travel advisories, real-time health monitoring at airports, and digital health passports","People":"Travelers, airline staff, hospitality workers, and tourism industry employees","Owner":"Government authorities, airline companies, and tourism boards"}]}
